Name: potassium permanganate production, manganese dioxide oxidation | potassium permanganate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: The production of potassium permanganate consists of two steps: first a fusion process (either by the roasting process or the liquid-phase process), followed by the anodic oxidation of manganate(VI) to permanganate by electrolysis (Reidies 2000).;References:;Reidies, A. H. 2000. Manganese Compounds. Ullmann's Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry.
